Episode.GuestStars: |Laura Spencer|John Ross Bowie|Alessandra Torresani|Creagen Dow|Shane Blades|
Episode.Overview: Sheldon and Amy host a live Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older, Howard and Bernadette find a surprise in their hot tub and Raj is torn between Emily and the cute girl he met at the Comic Bookstore.
Episode.Writer: |Steve Molaro|Jim Reynolds|Tara Hernandez|Steve Holland|Eric Kaplan|Jeremy Howe|
